duties_responsibilities.duty: Build lasting relationships with internal and external partners
Manage client's onsite Drugs of Abuse program
Assist with the development and implementation of workplace wellness programs, providing education and preventative care to all onsite partners
Integrate with the client project team to support client objectives and programs

education_certification.credential: Current State or National Certification or Registration as an EMT or Paramedic
Active BLS for Healthcare Providers Certification
Minimum of three years of experience in a pre-hospital or clinical environment
